/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by a variety of buildings and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
